title: Star Citizen [fixed]- Jump Point Issues 1-11 + Ship Brochures +
description:
Fixed - edited title to reflect proper number of Jump Point issues, sorry!

A bunch of Star Citizen related reading material that I scrounged from around the Internet and decided to upload here, since some of this has been unavailable as a torrent until now.

EPUB Fiction:

Cassandra's Tears - Dave Haddock
Tales of Kid Crimson - Dave Haddock
The Lost Generation - Dave Haddock
A Human Perspective - Timothy Brown
A Separate Law - Griffin Barber
Star Citizen Writer's Guide - Dave Haddock

JUMP POINT ISSUES 1 - 11

Jump Point 01.01 - Mayan End of the World edition (December 21, 2012)
Jump Point 01.02 - Last Flight of the Seraphim (January 25, 2013)
Jump Point 01.03 - Flying Into A Hornet's Nest (February 22, 2013)
Jump Point 01.04 - The Vanduul Horde (March 29, 2013)
Jump Point 01.05 - Aurora First Light (April 26, 2013)
Jump Point 01.06 - Charting The Constellation (May 31, 2013)
Jump Point 01.07 - The Next Generation is Now (June 28, 2013)
Jump Point 01.08 - A Few Good Men (Juli 26, 2013)
Jump Point 01.09 - Hanging Out (August 30, 2013)
Jump Point 01.10 - Lawyers, Guns and Money (September 27, 2013)
Jump Point 01.11 - Born Free (October 25, 2013)

SHIP BROCHURES: 

RSI Contellation
Aurora 2943
300 Series
